hero.title: Thai Adblock List
hero.subtitle: Clean browsing for Thai websites
hero.description: Block ads, trackers, and annoying content on Thai websites with our community-maintained filter list. Optimized for uBlock Origin, Adblock Plus, and all major ad blockers.

community.title: Community Powered
community.desc: Built by Thai users, for Thai users

updated.title: Always Fresh
updated.desc: New filters added weekly from community reports

compatible.title: Universal Support
compatible.desc: Works seamlessly with all popular ad blockers

features.title: How It Works
features.description: Thai Adblock List provides filter rules that instruct ad blocking software to block specific advertising elements on Thai websites.

filterFormat.title: Filter Format
filterFormat.description: Uses standard Adblock Plus filter syntax for maximum compatibility across different ad blocking software.

targetWebsites.title: Target Websites
targetWebsites.description: Focuses on Thai websites and advertising networks commonly used in Thailand.

updateFrequency.title: Update Frequency
updateFrequency.description: Filters are reviewed and updated based on user reports and regular monitoring of Thai websites.

maintenance.title: Maintenance
maintenance.description: Maintained by volunteers who actively browse Thai websites and identify new advertising patterns.

compatibility.title: Compatibility
compatibility.description: Thai Adblock List works with most popular ad blocking software that supports the EasyList filter format.

ublock.description: Full compatibility with all filter rules

adguard.description: Works with desktop and browser extensions

others.name: Other Ad Blockers
others.description: Most ad blockers using EasyList format

contribute.title: Join Our Community
contribute.description: Help make the Thai web cleaner by contributing filters or reporting problematic sites.

request.title: Report Annoying Ads
request.desc: Found a Thai site with intrusive ads? Let us know!

pr.title: Contribute Code
pr.desc: Know filter syntax? Help us improve directly!

community.title: Join Our Community
community.description: Every contribution helps make the Thai internet a better place. Whether you're reporting a new site or fixing existing filters, your help is appreciated.

download.title: Get Thai Adblock List
download.description: Choose your preferred ad blocker and subscribe to the Thai Adblock List with one click, or copy the raw URL for manual setup.
download.rawFilterDesc: Copy the URL below for manual installation or custom setups.

instructions.title: Setup Instructions
instructions.desc: Choose your ad blocker for step-by-step installation guide

adblock-plus.name: Adblock Plus
adblock-plus.description: Most popular ad blocker with easy one-click subscription

oneClick.title: One-Click Subscription
oneClick.desc: Automatically add the filter list to your Adblock Plus installation.

ublock-origin.name: uBlock Origin
ublock-origin.description: Advanced ad blocker with powerful filtering capabilities

oneClick.title: One-Click Subscription
oneClick.desc: Automatically add the filter list to your uBlock Origin installation.

adguard.name: AdGuard
adguard.description: Support both AdGuard Browser Extension and AdGuard Desktop.

oneClick.title: One-Click Subscription
oneClick.desc: Automatically add the filter list to your AdGuard installation.

others.description: We're working on adding support for more ad-blocking services. Have a specific provider in mind? Let us know on GitHub!

manual.title: Manual Installation Guide
manual.description: If one-click subscription doesn't work, follow these manual steps

adblock-plus.title: สำหรับ Adblock Plus
steps: Click on the ABP extension icon on your browser and choose 'Options'
Under the 'Advanced' tab, click 'Add a new filter list'
Enter the URL of the list you want to subscribe to
Give it a name (e.g., 'Thai Adblock List')
Click the 'Add a filter list' button

ublock-origin.title: สำหรับ uBlock Origin
steps: Click on the uBlock Origin icon in your browser's toolbar
Click the 'Open the dashboard' button (gear icon)
Go to the 'Filter lists' tab in the dashboard
Scroll down to the 'Custom' section and check the 'Import' box
Paste the filter list URL in the text area that appears
Click 'Apply changes' to save the settings

adguard.title: สำหรับ AdGuard
steps: Navigate to Settings > Ad blocker > Filters (Windows) or click '+' in Filters section (Mac)
For mobile: Go to Settings > DNS Filtering > DNS requests filtering > DNS filters
Paste the filter list URL or select 'Import from file'
Confirm the addition and ensure the filter is enabled

footer.description: Community-driven ad blocking for Thai websites
